channel.title: Comments on: Day One
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: Jenny
item.dc:creator: Jenny
item.description: What a great year, and a great month at that. I was born December 5th, close to Mark Twain and Emily Dickinson. Sagitarius rules.
item.content:encoded: What a great year, and a great month at that. I was born December 5th, close to Mark Twain and Emily Dickinson. Sagitarius rules.
